titles.title: God Is Building Up A People

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Once God made a covenant
with the house of Israel
He gave His laws through Moses
and His law did He proclaim
over tables of stone
with His finger God wrote
but the people was rebellious
and they did not keep His law

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
God said in Jeremiah
thirty-one thirty-three
There is coming up a day
A New Covenant will I make
I will write on them my laws
in their minds and in their hearts
They shall be to me My people
I will be to them their God
Chorus:
God is building up a people
The true and real Israel
I belong to God's own people
By His power and His grace. (2x)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Una vez Dios hizo un pacto
con la casa de Israel
por Moisés dio mandamiento
proclamando así la ley
sobre las tablas de piedra
con Su dedo El escribió
mas el pueblo fue rebelde
y Sus leyes no guardó

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Dice Dios en Jeremías
Treinta y uno treinta y tres
He aquí que viene el día
En que un Nuevo Pacto haré

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Yo escribiré Mis leyes
En su mente y corazón
Ellos me serán por pueblo
Y Yo les seré por Dios

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Coro:
Dios está formando un pueblo
El verdadero Israel
Pertenezco a ese pueblo
Por su gracia y su poder. (2x)
